attributes.action: make rulers personally liable for colateral damage in conflicts
attributes.additional_details: Outlaw punitive attacks on civilian populations on the false premise of their being accessories to atrocities committed by their leaders. Furhermore make individual political leaders legally responsible for colateral damage caused by such offensive actions. This since national and international grievances should be settled by the international judiciary  and effort should be directed towards the  indictment, eventual apprehension and certain punishment for crimes against humanity.
